Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppointmentController
    Controller for managing the windows that add and modify appointments.
    AppointmentFilter
    Base class of filters for the appointments tab on the main window, also serving as a namespace for the different filters, implemented as subclasses.
    AppointmentFilter.Monthly
    Filter of appointments by month, showing one month at a time.
    AppointmentFilter.None
    Filter that does not filter at all, resulting in a display of all appointments.
    AppointmentFilter.Weekly
    Filter of appointments by week, showing one week at a time.
    AppointmentsController
    Manages the appointments tab on the main window.
    Controller
    The base class for all controllers.
    CustomerController
    Controller for managing the windows that add and modify customers.
    CustomersController
    Manages the customers tab on the main window, which displays a table of all customers.
    LoginController
    Manages the login form, displaying errors on failure to login, and launching MainController on successful login to show the main window.
    MainController
    Manages the main window that opens after logging in.
    ReportsController
    Manages the reports tab on the main window, providing a drop-down menu for selecting the desired report, as well as a refresh button for updating the report to reflect the activity of other users.
    TablePaneController<I extends WithID>
    Base class for a controller that manages a particular tab of the main window.
    WindowController
    Base class for all controllers that represent windows (having a stage), configuring the details of the window, including its modality.
